images.copyright: Stairs on the shoreline at Mylopotamos Beach, Thessaly, Greece (© Orestis Zoumpos/Amazing Aerial Agency)
images.title: Step up to the challenge!
images.caption: Take the Stairs Day
images.desc: It's time to step up! Today is Take the Stairs Day, an initiative by the American Lung Association aimed at encouraging us to make small changes that can have a big impact on our well-being.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
